eu.wauz.wauzcore.menu

Class Backpack

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.menu.Backpack
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WauzInventory

    public class Backpack
extends java.lang.Object
implements WauzInventory
    An inventory that can be used as menu or for other custom interaction mechanics. Represents a virtual chest, the player can use however they want.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

    • Field Summary

      • selectMenuPoint

        public void selectMenuPoint(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent event)
        Checks if an event in this inventory was triggered by a player click. The event will be normally executed, just like inside a chest.
        Specified by:
        selectMenuPoint in interface WauzInventory
        Parameters:
